scripts.build: npm --prefix client ci && npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server ci
scripts.build:force: npm --prefix client install --no-save && npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server install --no-save
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix client run dev" "npm --prefix server run dev"
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/node_modules server/node_modules client/dist client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json package-lock.json
scripts.deps:check: npm --prefix client ls --depth=0 && npm --prefix server ls --depth=0
